A Mindfulness Approach To Social.

We are excited to present our @youremarks app to the world.

When everybody on this planet moves towards shiny new mediums like voice and short videos, we see no sincere attempts to improve our text-based communications.

There is an opportunity to exploit with text, and that's what we are attempting with @youremarks.

Our text-based mediums are, like Email and Twitter, inherently ambiguous. Most of the time, the sender and receiver have different viewpoints over the same text, mostly because of assumptions and missing cues to convey the intent.

To address this gap and promote mindfulness in our daily digital life, we introduce the system to reduce ambiguity and unknowns and encourage users to provide more information cues to convey the message.

We did this by combining thoughtful content formats and gamification. This platform enables attention to thoughts, feelings, and mental judgments our minds make in everyday aspects of digital social life.
